mapper.select: SELECT s.id_Sugang AS idEnrollment, s.id_Student, p.pgm_Name, s.id_Pgm, p.id_Cate, s.st_Dt AS SugangStDt, s.status, p.st_Dt, p.end_Dt, p.pgm_Fee, c.cate_Name, cr.room_Name, prof.name FROM Sugang s JOIN Program p ON s.id_Pgm = p.id_Pgm JOIN Category c ON p.id_Cate = c.id_Cate JOIN Class_Room cr ON p.id_Room = cr.id_Room JOIN Professor prof ON p.id_Prof = prof.id_Prof WHERE s.id_Student = #{idStudent}
SELECT s.id_student AS idStudent, s.name, s.birth, s.tel, s.address, s.gender, u.email, u.id_user AS idUser FROM student s JOIN user u ON s.id_user = u.id_user WHERE u.id_user = #{idUser}

SELECT s.id_Sugang AS idEnrollment, s.id_Student, p.pgm_Name, s.id_Pgm, p.id_Cate, s.st_Dt AS SugangStDt, s.status, p.st_Dt, p.end_Dt, p.pgm_Fee, c.cate_Name, cr.room_Name, prof.name, prof.id_Prof FROM Sugang s JOIN Program p ON s.id_Pgm = p.id_Pgm JOIN Category c ON p.id_Cate = c.id_Cate JOIN Class_Room cr ON p.id_Room = cr.id_Room JOIN Professor prof ON p.id_Prof = prof.id_Prof WHERE s.id_Student = #{idStudent}

SELECT sugang.id_sugang AS idEnrollment, sugang.id_student AS idStudent, sugang.id_Pgm AS idPgm, sugang.id_Cate AS idCate, sugang.status AS status, sugang.course_Status AS courseStatus, program.pgm_Name AS pgmName, program.st_Dt AS stDt, program.end_Dt AS endDt, program.pgm_Fee AS pgmFee, category.cate_Name AS cateName, class_room.room_Name AS roomName, professor.name AS name, professor.id_Prof AS idProf FROM Sugang sugang JOIN Program program ON sugang.id_Pgm = program.id_Pgm JOIN Category category ON program.id_Cate = category.id_Cate JOIN Class_Room class_room ON program.id_Room = class_room.id_Room JOIN Professor professor ON program.id_Prof = professor.id_Prof WHERE sugang.id_student = #{idStudent}

SELECT sugang.id_sugang AS idEnrollment, sugang.id_student AS idStudent, sugang.id_Pgm AS idPgm, sugang.id_Cate AS idCate, sugang.status AS status, sugang.course_Status AS courseStatus, program.pgm_Name AS pgmName, program.st_Dt AS stDt, program.end_Dt AS endDt, program.pgm_Fee AS pgmFee, category.cate_Name AS cateName, class_room.room_Name AS roomName, professor.name AS name, professor.id_Prof AS idProf FROM Sugang sugang JOIN Program program ON sugang.id_Pgm = program.id_Pgm JOIN Category category ON program.id_Cate = category.id_Cate JOIN Class_Room class_room ON program.id_Room = class_room.id_Room JOIN Professor professor ON program.id_Prof = professor.id_Prof WHERE sugang.id_student = #{idStudent}

SELECT p.id_Pgm, p.id_Cate, p.id_Room, p.id_Prof, p.pgm_Name, p.st_Dt, p.end_Dt, p.sugang_St_Dt, p.sugang_End_Dt, p.pgm_Target, p.pgm_Method, p.pgm_Per, p.pgm_Fee, c.cate_Name, r.room_Name, pr.name AS prof_Name FROM Program p JOIN Category c ON p.id_Cate = c.id_Cate JOIN class_room r ON p.id_Room = r.id_Room JOIN Professor pr ON p.id_Prof = pr.id_Prof WHERE p.id_Pgm = #{id};

SELECT p.id_Pgm, p.id_Cate, p.id_Room, p.id_Prof, p.pgm_Name, p.st_Dt, p.end_Dt, p.sugang_St_Dt, p.sugang_End_Dt, p.pgm_Target, p.pgm_Method, p.pgm_Per, p.pgm_Fee, c.cate_Name, r.room_Name, pr.name AS prof_Name FROM Program p JOIN Category c ON p.id_Cate = c.id_Cate JOIN class_room r ON p.id_Room = r.id_Room JOIN Professor pr ON p.id_Prof = pr.id_Prof WHERE pr.id_Prof = #{id};

SELECT p.id_Pgm, p.id_Cate, p.id_Room, p.id_Prof, p.pgm_Name, p.st_Dt, p.end_Dt, p.sugang_St_Dt, p.sugang_End_Dt, p.pgm_Target, p.pgm_Method, p.pgm_Per, p.pgm_Fee, c.cate_Name, r.room_Name, pr.name AS prof_Name FROM Program p JOIN Category c ON p.id_Cate = c.id_Cate JOIN class_room r ON p.id_Room = r.id_Room JOIN Professor pr ON p.id_Prof = pr.id_Prof WHERE p.id_Pgm IN (SELECT id_Pgm FROM Sugang WHERE id_student = #{idStudent});
